chat.description: Handles all conversational AI, messaging, and related features.

health.description: Health data management, metrics tracking, dashboard visibility controls, and data import/export functionality.

devices.description: Manages connections to external devices and data sources (e.g., native health kits).

memory.description: Controls the AI's long-term memory, including storage, retrieval, and deduplication.

file-manager.description: Comprehensive file management system with upload, categorization, sharing, Go acceleration, and intelligent retention policies.

settings.description: Manages user preferences, application settings, and configurations. Contains user information.

logging.description: Production-ready structured logging system with configurable levels and clean output formatting.

performance.description: Application performance optimization including lazy loading, caching strategies, and startup optimization.
